شركة الجود للصرافة والحوالات المالية تمت: Al JOUD Form Money Exchange & Transfers, has both a strong financial history and a rich current financial standing. The company is licensed form the Palestinian Monetary authority (works as a central bank) to practice and provide financial services, including Cash Pick up Money Exchange and Billing since 2012 However the company was established in 1996 and started in providing its services since 1996.The company has two branches, the main branch in Gaza City and the second one in Khan-Younis City. We have an excellent financial position as we are rating as one of the little top leaders of the sector here in Palestine
شركة الجـــود إحدى كبرى الشركات الفلسطين: Al-Joud Company is one of the largest private Palestinian companies working in the field of currency exchange and money transfers under the umbrella of the Palestinian Monetary Authority
Al-Joud Company is one of the largest private Palestinian companies

شركة الجود للصرافة والحوالات المالية تمت: Al-Joud Exchange and Money Transfer Company has a strong financial history and a distinguished position at the present time. The company is licensed by the Palestinian Monetary Authority and the Central Bank to practice and provide financial services, including managing cash collections, money transfers, currency exchange, in addition to paying and collecting bills since 2012.
نقدم صرف العملات الأجنبية بأسعار منافسة: We offer foreign exchange at competitive rates, flexibility in dealing and the largest possible basket of currencies against the US dollar.
إذا كنت تحتاج إلى إرسال الأموال بسرعة وأ: If you need to send money quickly and securely, our transfer service is the ideal choice. We deal with a wide network of international banks and remittance companies to ensure that funds arrive safely and in a short time. Whether the transfers are for personal or business purposes, we can provide customized solutions to suit your needs.
حيث ومن خلال شركتنا دفع الفواتير الخاصة: Where, through our company, pay your bills and your business very quickly and with the highest standards of safety, such as Jawwal company bills, telecommunications, university fees, electricity company, etc...
تفضل بزيارة أحد فروعنا أو اتصل بأحد قنوا: Visit one of our branches or contact one of our contact channels for more information and inquiries. Al-Joud Company is here to help you achieve your financial needs with ease and reliability
مرحبًا بكم في موقع شركة الجود للصرافة وا: We are pleased to welcome you to the website of Al JOUD company for money exchange and transfers. In my role as chairman of the company, I would like to express my gratitude to you for entrusting us with your business. Providing exceptional financial services tailored to your needs is something we are committed to.
أؤكد ان شركة الجود للصرافة والحوالات الم: This field is a specialty area that we pride ourselves on and our specialized team holds a lot of expertise in. We strive to ensure your complete satisfaction and offer reliable financial solutions. Al JOUD company for money exchange and transfers prioritizes leadership, innovation, and the implementation of scientific principles that keep pace with technological advancements to serve the best interests of our clients and enhance their well-being.
رئيس مجلس إدارة شركة الجود للصرافة والحو: Chairman of the Board of Directors of Al-Joud Exchange and Money Transfers Company
الريادة في تقديم خدمات مالية تساعد في تح: We strive to be a leader in providing financial services that contribute to our clients' well-being.
تحقيق الاستدامة في ريادة القطاع الصرافة: Achieving sustainability in leading the Money Exchange sector across all its current and future domains, including fast and international money transfers, foreign currency exchange, bill services, by providing financial services that befit client's aspirations, utilizing the latest technological means that help in achieving this goal.
